item.title: Spending bill trouble brews as Sen Mike Lee warns of Christmas 'swampbus'
item.description: Republican Sen. Mike Lee is urging Americans to pressure their senators and representatives to oppose a pre-Christmas omnibus bill.

item.title: Harris campaign costs for star-studded events on election eve ballooned to over $10M: report
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris reportedly spent tens of millions of dollars on star-studded events in several swing states on the eve of Election Day.
